course.subject: ELEC
course.name: RF/Microwave Circuit Design and Measurement
course.description: Introduction to techniques for analyzing, engineering and testing of circuits for RF/microwave frequencies using CAD tools.  The lab provides hands-on CAD/simulation, building and testing of low-noise amplifier, mixer, VCO, filter, IF AGC, detectors and other circuits discussed in lecture.

reviews.author: lizerrr
reviews.title: good class
reviews.comment_content: class with lecture and labs. The course is about techniques for analyzing, engineering and testing of circuits for RF/microwave frequencies using CAD tools.
reviews.comment_teaching: Kevin is very professional about this topic. And the teacher for the experiment in the lab is very friendly. He can help to solve the problem in the lab.
reviews.comment_grading: The class is easy to pass, because it containing many experiment, and it is not hard to get the grades about the experiment.
reviews.comment_workload: If you finish the experiment in the class, which most of the student can do, the work load would not too big.
